value.name: Father of teen busted with AK-47 in Times Square was killed in police shootout

value.description: Teague’s dad, Andrew Teague, 43, died March 5 after a shootout with police in Columbus, sources said. According to media reports, police tried to execute an arrest warrant for a Feb. 2 shooting ...

value.name: Teen carrying AK-47 in Times Square was 'confused about NYC gun laws'
value.description: His father, Andrew Teague, 43, was shot dead by Ohio police in a shootout last month. Police had a warrant out for his arrest for felonious assault and were pursuing him in his car.

value.name: Teague, Lessie Faye

value.name: Ohio State students demand university cuts ties with Columbus police after Ma'Khia Bryant shooting

value.name: Columbus police release body camera, dashcam footage of pursuit, shooting on I-270
value.description: Body and dash camera video show the lengths Columbus police and the Franklin County Sheriff’s Office took to stop Andrew Teague. Author: 10tv.com Published: 6:24 PM EST March 9, 2021

value.name: Full List of 229 Black People Killed by Police Since George Floyd's Murder
value.description: U.S. George Floyd Police Killings Police brutality Black Lives Matter At least 229 Black people have been killed by police officers across the U.S. in the year since George Floyd's murder.
